name: There will be drones
description:
"Blue and Red are stranded, working at a mining facility on a desolate planet. With nothing much to do they build drones to trigger the planetary defence system and shoot centenary drones for a score based game imagined by the two of them."

Shmup action!
Cool teleporting power!

Student game. Developed by Thunder Stork at The Game Assembly.

Credits:

Artists
Adam Karlsson - Tobjörn Lindfors - Stina Råderstig       

Level Designers
Oscar Maris - Pål Schakonat

Programmers

Mattias Anderson - Filip Carkic - Robin Ericsson - Robert Parrell - Mattias Ringström
